body: If one trap depends on the success of the other (that is, you can avoid the second trap by not falling victim to the first), characters earn XP for both traps by defeating the first one, regardless if the second one is also sprung.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Environment/Sample Traps/Designing a Trap/Challenge Rating of a Trap/Multiple Traps/Multiple Dependent Traps
name: Multiple Dependent Traps
